other_tests.findings: Total T4 was 44 nmol/liter (normal range, 64–161) and TSH was 2.7 mU/liter (normal range, 0.4–5.5). After treatment with levothyroxine, serum TT4 rose to 135 nmol/liter and TSH was low at 0.05 mU/liter. TBG was 17 ng/liter (normal range, 17–36).
other_tests.changes_over_time: TT4 levels ranged from 26–136 nmol/liter and TBG concentrations ranged from 9–19 mg/liter over a period of 15 months.

other_tests.findings: Revealed reduced TBG binding capacity and normal affinity for the T4 ligand in sera from the proposita and her son.
Identified a C-to-T transition in codon /H110022 (CAC to TAC), resulting in a histidine-to-tyrosine substitution in the signal peptide.
